title: Noh Robe, ca. 1800
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic yarns
Technique: discontinuous supplementary weft (brocading)
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt
description: Theatrical robe of terra-cotta silk twill brocaded heavily in polychrome silks and gilded paper-wrapped silk-core yarns. The design is of bamboo lattice-work and vines, chrysanthemums, berries and butterflies. Lined with solid color terracotta silk.

tombstone.epitaph:
Noh Robe, ca. 1800.
ca. 1800. Medium: silk, metallic yarns
Technique: discontinuous supplementary weft (brocading). Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt, from the textile collection of Mrs. Abram Stevens Hewitt. 1931-4-60.
